resources.string: You are almost ready to start playing, but there are a few things that we must configure first.
External storage isn\'t available! Please make sure That your device is unplugged from your computer and that your SD card is inserted (if applicable). Then restart the app.
The setup wizard will run again when you next launch the game.
You should place the original Theme Hospital files on your device in a directory called \'th\', or choose an alternative below.
Preparing Game Files. This only needs to run once, but may take a while.
This will download and install the Theme Hospital demo which will give you access to the basic functionality of the game.
There was a problem downloading the demo files!
CorsixTH supports multiple languages. Please choose from the supported languages below.
Error downloading file. Music will not be available. Please try again later.
Music requires an additional download. Download file (14.1MB)?
You need an active internet connection to download. Please connect to a network and try again.
